nodes.text: Kanarak, also known as Kanarak the Slayer, was a vicious and undisciplined killer, he habitually carried a Flash 4 heavy blaster pistol, a vibro-ax, and a "death necklace" made from the bones of his victims. Kanarak was reptilian in appearance, with large teeth, and a thick, dark mane of hair.
While on StarForge Station Kanarak responded to a call by Captain Dhas Vedij to join the crew of the Rebel privateer vessel Far Orbit.
